articles.author: Anthony Wood
articles.title: How Scientists are Grappling With the Challenges of Sex and Reproduction in Space - IGN
articles.description: Netherlands-based company SpaceBorn United wants to help figure out if humans can safely reproduce in space, by conducting in vitro fertilisation experiments during orbital missions using mouse, and later human sex reproductive cells
articles.content: An increasing number of people are opening up to the idea that humanitys survival is tied to our ability to become a multi-planetary species. But for this to become a reality, countless technological… [+7861 chars]
